articles.description: Netflix is said to be testing support for Apple’s Spatial Audio feature, according to a new report. This will allow users with the AirPods Pro and AirPods Max to view content with Spatial Audio, which was released with iOS 14.
articles.content: Netflix is reportedly testing support for Apple's Spatial Audio feature, which currently works on the AirPods Pro true wireless earphones and AirPods Max headphones. Most users, even with a premium N… [+2453 chars]

articles.description: Vivo X60 Pro+ launch date is January 21st, as confirmed by the company through a poster. Key specs may include Snapdragon 888 5G, quad cameras, and a 120Hz display.
